residential.title: White wings Group
residential.body: Remember, finding the perfect home or investment isn’t just about the property—it’s about choosing a space that truly fits your life. At White Wings, we offer a carefully selected range of homes, from luxurious villas to cozy apartments, along with detailed listings and expert guidance to support you every step of the way. Explore with confidence and make a choice that feels right.

items.name: Torrance
items.address: Torrance, G.D Goenka Canal Road, OPP. J9 Commercial Complex, Vesu, Surat, Gujarat 395007

detailInfo.title: Location
detailInfo.body: Torrance, G.D Goenka Canal Road, OPP. J9 Commercial Complex, Vesu, Surat, Gujarat 395007

Torrance is a premium residential project in Surat, proudly recognized as the city's first IGBC Pre-Certified Platinum Green Building. Located on the bustling G.D. Goenka Canal Road in Vesu, this 13-floor development features two wings of spacious 4BHK apartments — just 52 exclusive flats in a gated community. Designed with vastu compliance and an emphasis on sustainability, Torrance offers a blend of luxury and environmental responsibility through features like a 25KW solar power system, abundant daylight, UPVC windows, and energy-efficient systems.

Beyond its architecture, Torrance offers an elevated lifestyle with state-of-the-art amenities including Jacuzzi & steam bath, a ceremonial hall, modern fitness center, and double basement parking. Residents enjoy a calm yet connected experience with scenic terraces, a landscaped garden equipped with music systems, and thoughtful additions like water softeners and open plumbing. Torrance is where refined living meets green innovation — crafted for those who value both comfort and conscience.

video.title: Drone Video of TORRANCE
video.summary: Take a bird’s-eye view of Torrance — Surat’s first IGBC Pre-Certified Platinum Green Building. Explore its striking architecture, lush landscapes, and thoughtfully planned surroundings through this aerial walkthrough.
